firm.card_description: This section offers a comprehensive and structured overview of all firm, ensuring clarity and ease of access.
firm.deletePrompt: Do you really want to delete the firm

detailmenu.title: {{firmName}}'s Details
detailmenu.description: You can edit the inspect all details of {{firmName}} here.

firm.introduce_info_description: Please provide the required details of the new company in the fields below.
firm.edit_info_description: You can edit the {{firmName}} here by providing the required information.

interlocutor.associate_firm_when empty: No firm association, Add the first association ?
interlocutor.card_description: This section offers a comprehensive and structured overview of all interlocutors, ensuring clarity and ease of access.
interlocutor.create_dialog_description: Use this menu to create a new interlocutor or associate an existing one. Make sure all required fields are filled before saving.
interlocutor.update_dialog_description: Enter the details to update the interlocutor. Make sure all required fields are filled before saving.
interlocutor.disassociate_dialog_description: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All associations with this company will also be removed.
interlocutor.promote_dialog_description: Ensure this action aligns with their responsibilities, as it may impact system functionality.
interlocutor.delete_dialog_description: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All associations with this interlocutor will also be removed.
interlocutor.disassociate_prompt: Do you really want to disassociate the interlocutor
interlocutor.promote_prompt: Do you really want to promote the interlocutor
interlocutor.delete_prompt: Do you really want to delete the interlocutor

errors.surpassed_firm_limit: You have mentioned all the possible firm available
